nodes.bodyText:
From the SO post linked in the ticket:

When \c is followed by an ASCII lowercase letter, chr(ord($char) ^ 0x60).

As you explained to me, this is not the case in Java, so the implementation is fine.
Can you maybe add a comment in the ticket, to explain this briefly?
